comment: fieldwork index: shared index over multiple fieldwork activity tables
sample location index (technical) or NULL for obsolete visits
GRTS address (`final`, i.e. after prior replacements) needed for retainer lookup
a link to the activity metadata, brought here via fieldworkcalendar for convenience
start of the panel activity sequence (included to keep recurrent visits unique)
link to the user who performed the visit
double check that the activity was complete
LIMS project code of this sample
LIMS recipient code of this sample
